title: Universal Macro
description: Standardized macro placeholders for dynamic value substitution in creative tracking URLs. Macros are replaced with actual values at impression time. See docs/creative/universal-macros.mdx for detailed documentation.

enumDescriptions.CLICK_URL: Publisher's click tracking URL (auto-inserted by sales agent)
enumDescriptions.GPP_SID: GPP Section ID(s) indicating applicable privacy framework sections
enumDescriptions.IP_ADDRESS: User IP address (often masked for privacy, may return empty)
enumDescriptions.DEVICE_TYPE: Device category (mobile, tablet, desktop, ctv, dooh)
enumDescriptions.OS: Operating system (iOS, Android, tvOS, Roku, etc.)
enumDescriptions.POD_SIZE: Total ads in the ad break
enumDescriptions.CATALOG_ID: Buyer-defined catalog identifier from the catalog's catalog_id field
enumDescriptions.SKU: Product SKU identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.GTIN: Global Trade Item Number for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.OFFERING_ID: AdCP offering identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.JOB_ID: Job posting identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.HOTEL_ID: Hotel property identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.FLIGHT_ID: Flight route identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.VEHICLE_ID: Vehicle listing identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.LISTING_ID: Real estate listing identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.STORE_ID: Store location identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.PROGRAM_ID: Education program identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.DESTINATION_ID: Travel destination identifier for the catalog item being rendered
enumDescriptions.CREATIVE_VARIANT_ID: Seller-assigned creative variant identifier, passed through at serve time
enumDescriptions.APP_ITEM_ID: Mobile app identifier for the catalog item being rendered
